description:
Have you found yourself in a situation with the potential to alter the course of your life forever? If so, you probably feel as though your life is spiraling out of control. When you suffer serious injuries in an accident, suffer irreparable harm due to a medical mistake or face an employment issue, look no further than Headley Ballard LLC.

Our law firm's attorneys understand that you need to get your life back on track and pursue the maximum amount of compensation and other damages to which you are entitled. We strive to provide competent and compassionate legal representation to you and anyone else living in Daniel Island, South Carolina, and the surrounding areas who are facing situations similar to yours. Our team has successfully fought for people dealing with numerous legal matters, including those listed below:

  • All types of personal injury and wrongful death claims, including motor vehicle accidents and premises and product liability claims
  • Medical malpractice claims, such as surgical errors, misdiagnoses, medication mistakes and more
  • Employee claims, such as sexual harassment, discrimination, wrongful termination and more

When you work with our law firm, we will review any settlement offers you may receive with a look toward both your immediate needs and any future needs you may have. Our team wants to make sure you never look back and regret not fighting for what you deserve, and should negotiations break down, our attorneys are more than willing and prepared to take your claims to court.

If you want an honest assessment of your case and answers to your questions and concerns, contact Headley Ballard LLC today to schedule an initial consultation. Our law firm also offers virtual consultations in an effort to help you and your family remain safe in today's uncertain environment.
